pages.text: A sacred ritual dagger, which traditionally has a black handle. When creatures are slain by an Athame, they may drop unique reagents. The Athame is also used as an aid in conjurings.

A sickle that usually has a white handle. The Boline can harmlessly harvest items from creatures, such as feathers from a raven, or string from a sheep. It is also used when conducting more nature-oriented rituals.
